request.description:
取得 RabbitMQ cluster 中所有 node 列表

[RabbitMQ APO](https://rawcdn.githack.com/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-server/v3.10.7/deps/rabbitmq_management/priv/www/api/index.html)

依據 name 取得 RabbitMQ cluster 中的 node 資訊

[RabbitMQ APO](https://rawcdn.githack.com/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-server/v3.10.7/deps/rabbitmq_management/priv/www/api/index.html)

A list of all open connections. Use pagination parameters to filter connections.

[RabbitMQ APO](https://rawcdn.githack.com/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-server/v3.10.7/deps/rabbitmq_management/priv/www/api/index.html)

A list of all exchanges. Use pagination parameters to filter exchanges.

[RabbitMQ APO](https://rawcdn.githack.com/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-server/v3.10.7/deps/rabbitmq_management/priv/www/api/index.html)

取得所有 vhost 列表 

[RabbitMQ APO](https://rawcdn.githack.com/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-server/v3.10.7/deps/rabbitmq_management/priv/www/api/index.html)

新增一個 vhost，正常回應 201、重覆回應 204

[RabbitMQ APO](https://rawcdn.githack.com/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-server/v3.10.7/deps/rabbitmq_management/priv/www/api/index.html)

依據 name 取得 vhost 資訊

[RabbitMQ APO](https://rawcdn.githack.com/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-server/v3.10.7/deps/rabbitmq_management/priv/www/api/index.html)

依據 name 刪除 vhost

[RabbitMQ APO](https://rawcdn.githack.com/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-server/v3.10.7/deps/rabbitmq_management/priv/www/api/index.html)

依據 name 取得 vhost 資訊

[RabbitMQ APO](https://rawcdn.githack.com/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-server/v3.10.7/deps/rabbitmq_management/priv/www/api/index.html)

新增一個 vhost，正常回應 201、重覆回應 204

[RabbitMQ APO](https://rawcdn.githack.com/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-server/v3.10.7/deps/rabbitmq_management/priv/www/api/index.html)

依據 name 取得 vhost 資訊

[RabbitMQ APO](https://rawcdn.githack.com/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-server/v3.10.7/deps/rabbitmq_management/priv/www/api/index.html)

取得 vhost 中的 exchange 列表

[RabbitMQ APO](https://rawcdn.githack.com/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-server/v3.10.7/deps/rabbitmq_management/priv/www/api/index.html)

新增 exchange 於 vhost 中

[RabbitMQ APO](https://rawcdn.githack.com/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-server/v3.10.7/deps/rabbitmq_management/priv/www/api/index.html)

刪除 vhost 中的 exchange

[RabbitMQ APO](https://rawcdn.githack.com/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-server/v3.10.7/deps/rabbitmq_management/priv/www/api/index.html)

新增 exchange 於 vhost 中

[RabbitMQ APO](https://rawcdn.githack.com/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-server/v3.10.7/deps/rabbitmq_management/priv/www/api/index.html)

取得 RabbitMQ cluster 中所有 node 列表

[RabbitMQ APO](https://rawcdn.githack.com/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-server/v3.10.7/deps/rabbitmq_management/priv/www/api/index.html)

新增一個 vhost，正常回應 201、重覆回應 204
